name: BLEARGH
description:
MONSTERS HAVE CONQUERED THE PLANET AND ENSLAVED THE HUMAN RACE, BUT THEY ARE NOT SATYSFIED!

That's right, they are also coming for YOUR minecraft speedrun record! But first they are breaking EVERY SPEEDRUN RECORD HELD BY HUMANS!!!

Music by the amazingly incredible Manukapp! Check his Spotify and Youtube channels for more amazingly incredible content!

Thanks to mr. Dino0040 and mr. MatchaMaze for helping such an annoying noob as myself :P
